title: Urn Stand, ca. 1800
medium: Mahogany, satinwood, rosewood and harewood; pine frame of top; brass mounting
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Oval top edged with brass strip inlaid; rectangular slide with small brass handles. Square tapering legs splayed outward, ending in spade feet joined by X-frame stretchers. Legs have stainwood line inlay; frieze has satinwood line inlay, crossbanding of harewood, and small medallions of harewood inlaid above each leg. (Stretchers possibly replaced?)

tombstone.epitaph: Urn Stand, ca. 1800.Mahogany, satinwood, rosewood and harewood; pine frame of top; brass mounting. Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1926-22-369.
